text: Stepan Andrianovich Kalinin () (28 December 1890 – 11 September 1975) was a Soviet army commander. He fought in the Imperial Russian Army during World War I before going over to the Bolsheviks during the subsequent civil war. He was promoted to Komkor (corps commander) in 1938. He was a member of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. He was a recipient of the Order of Lenin and the Order of the Red Banner. He retired at the age of 56. ==Sources and external links== * Выступление С. А. Калинина на совещании высшего командного состава Красной Армии в декабре 1940 года * Статья о С. А.
